scripts.create-migration: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm migration:create -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts -n
scripts.run-migrations: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm migration:run -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.revert-migrations: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm migration:revert -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.generate-migrations: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm migration:generate -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.create-migration-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm migration:create -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts -n
scripts.run-migrations-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm migration:run -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.revert-migrations-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm migration:revert -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.generate-migrations-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm migration:generate -- --config src/config/typeorm/typeorm.config.ts
